refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates a stiffness (connection) matrix for use in scanu/scanu2.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Generates a stiffness matrix from a text file of triples numbers.

refentry.refsect1:
Performance
The file named in version 1 or the file stiff.num in the second case is read to create the matrix.
The first line of the file should be
<MATRIX size=integer>
and it creates a square matrix of the indicated size. This is followed by lines of two or three numbers, the first two denoting a connection from the first to the second and the third is a weight. If the third is omitted it is taken as value 1. The list is terminated by a
</MATRIX>
line or end of file. can be given as zero in which case a size*size table is created. If the size in the gen statememt is too small for the matrix then space is re-allocated to the required size.
